card.name: UU01 — All-Seeing Acolyte
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1.

card.name: UU04 — Watcher of Many Minds
card.text: Flying Whenever Watcher enters, look at the top three cards of target players library. You may choose to place any number of them in their owner’s graveyard.

card.name: CA11 — Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: UU11 — Mapping Algorithm
card.text: Exile the top card of your opponents library. You may play that card this turn as if any mana was used to cast it.

card.name: UB10 — The Fall of the Rats
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice it after III.) I — Target creature you don’t control gains -4/-4 until end of turn. II — Until end of turn, up to four target creatures you control gain +1/+1 and one target creature you control gains -4/-4. III — Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. ---

card.name: UR10 — The Runners War
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice it after III.) I — Discard up to four cards, then draw that many cards. II — Deal 1 damage to up to four creatures. III — Create two colorless 3/3 Construct artifact creature tokens.

card.name: UW10 — The Revival
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice it after III.) I — Gain 5 life. II — Create 4 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens. III — Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: UG10 — Tale of the Gardener
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice it after III.) I — Mill 4 cards. Create a Treasure token for each creature card milled this way. II — Place a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with power 4 or greater. III — Target creature you control fights another creature.

card.name: UM04 — Recruiting Drive
card.text: If a token would be created under your control, that many tokens plus one are created instead. At the beginning of your end step, if a token was created under your control this turn, draw a card.

card.name: UM05 — Last of the Rats
card.text: Flying 3UB, {T}: Search your library for a spell with mana value equal to or less than the number of nonland permanents in your graveyard, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: UM03 — Training Matrix
card.text: Whenever you attack with one or more equipped creatures, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token. {2}, {T}: Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with equip {1} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”

card.name: UM01 — Archbishop Li Teain
card.text: Whenever you cast a card from exile, tap target creature. Whenever you scry, exile a card from your hand. You may play that card as if any mana were used to cast it. {T}, 1WU: Draw a card.

card.name: UM09 — Laz, The Traitor
card.text: Backstab costs you pay cost {1} less. 1BG: Create a 1/1 black and green Assassin creature token with deathtouch.

card.name: UM07 — Test Pilot
card.text: Hexproof, Ace (This creature crews vehicles as if its power were 2 greater). Whenever a Vehicle you control attacks, place a +1/+1 counter upon target creature you control.

card.name: UM08 — Reckless Killer
card.text: Whenever a creature or artifact you control dies, place a +1/+1 counter on Reckless Killer. If Reckless Killer has 4 or more +1/+1 counters on it, it gains menace and first strike.

card.name: UM10 — Captain Wen O'Malli
card.text: All Pirates you control gain trample and “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”

card.name: CW17 — Nanomachines
card.text: Flash Whenever Nanomachines enters, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip 3W (3W: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: UU03 — Inspired Inventor
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, place an oil counter on UU03. Remove X oil counters from Inspired Inventor: Scry X.

card.name: CU08 — Self-Learning Titan
card.text: Whenever you crew a vehicle, place an oil counter on Self-Learning Titan. {1}, Remove an oil counter: Self-Learning Titan gets a +1/+1 counter until end of turn. Crew 2

card.name: CU16 — Flash of Genius
card.text: Draw 2 cards. You may reveal an artifact card from your hand. If you do, place an oil counter on target permanent. Flashback 3U

card.name: CU18 — Oathkeeper Protector
card.text: Defender Oathkeeper Protector can attack as if it didn’t have defender as long as an artifact entered under your control this turn.

card.name: CU17 — Spark of Knowledge
card.text: Place two oil counters on target creature you control. Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: CG13 — Initate's Growth
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: CR07 — Unstable Prototype
card.text: When Unstable Prototype dies, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, deal 2 damage to any target.

card.name: CR09 — Mad Inventor
card.text: When Mad Inventor enters, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: CR04 — Rampage Robot
card.text: Rampage Robot has menace as long as it has 3 or more oil counters on it. Whenever a creature you control attacks, put an oil counter on Rampage Robot.

card.name: CR18 — Living Node
card.text: Whenever an artifact enters under your control, place an oil counter on target creature. Remove an oil counter from equipped creature: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Equip 2R (2R: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: CR12 — Spark of Passion
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of permanents you control with oil counters on them.

card.name: CR15 — Sudden Airstrike
card.text: Target creature gains +2/+0 and first strike until end of turn. Create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: UU12 — Mana Disconnection
card.text: Flash Target creature loses all abilities and becomes an Elf Citizen with power and toughness 0/2.

card.name: UA06 — Scrapyard Scavenger
card.text: If you have 4 or more artifact cards in your graveyard, UA06 gets +2/+2 and ward {2}. {4}, {T}: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: UW08 — Serrated Angel
card.text: Flying, Vigilance Foretell 3W If this spell was foretold, when Serrated Angel enters, it deals 1 damage to each creature opponent controls.

card.name: UW02 — Omniscent Overseer
card.text: Whenever you scry, tap target creature you don’t control.

card.name: UW04 — Protective Quartermaster
card.text: Equipped creatures you control have +0+2. 3W, {T}: Target equipped creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
